item.description:
The forecast is looking good for this summer's fourth ice cream ride!

This Wednesday 8/1... and every Wednesday through September 12th:

Meet at the flagpole on the Green at 6:00PM, rain or shine.

Rides will leave at 6:15 sharp!

This week: Wentworth's, a nationally-recognized family shop next to Sleeping Giant. This is the longest "ice cream ride" (about 18 miles round trip), so the pace will be similar to or slightly faster than
last week's, but still suitable for all experience levels. Much of
this ride is along a wooded rail-trail, so the route is cool, flat and
easy. Bring water, a helmet and a few extra bucks.
item.name: Wednesday Night Ice Cream Ride
